com.nokia.midp.examples.IAPInfoAPI.iapinfotest
Class TestUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.nokia.midp.examples.IAPInfoAPI.iapinfotest.TestUtil

public class TestUtil
extends java.lang.Object

TestUtil class contains only static methods which are accessible from all classes in the MIDlet. Each class in the example uses this TestUtil class to obtain information about the available access points or destination networks. The class has no contrusctor, because there is no need to instantiate any object. The class contains the correct usage of the IAPInfo API, calling all available methods with the corrent parameter(s). Methods does not handles the IAPInfoException they are handled in the method caller. The methods are as simple as they can be, to make the code more readable and easier to understand.

getDNById

public static com.nokia.mid.iapinfo.DestinationNetwork getDNById(int aId)
                                                          throws com.nokia.mid.iapinfo.IAPInfoException
Searches a destination network by its id. If an error occurs during the operation, then a new IAPInfoException is thrown, else a new DestinationNetwork object is returned

Parameters:
aId - the id of the destination network
Returns:
DestinationNetwork the found destination network
Throws:
IAPInfoException
com.nokia.mid.iapinfo.IAPInfoException
